Telegram Messenger ‏已認證帳戶 @telegram

The main network switch went down in the Telegram server cluster in Singapore. Asian users are affected. Investigating and fixing!


垃圾公司,single point of failure.
咁具規模既公司所有server 都應該連兩個switch.保證一個死仲有另一個頂住.
佢咁樣死法實叫vendor黎換PARTS,隨時等返幾個鐘先得.
